eas_text: A civil authority has issued AN ADMINISTRATIVE MESSAGE for the following counties or areas: Gila, AZ; Arizona; Apache; Cochise; Graham; Greenlee; La Paz; Maricopa; Mohave; Navajo; Pima; Pinal; Santa Cruz; Yavapai; Yuma, AZ; at 06:18 AM ON JAN 1, 2026 Effective until 02:18 PM. Message from WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: A SAFE Alert has been issued for El Mirage Police Department. El Mirage Police Department is looking for Debra Paules, last seen in a black wheelchair, wearing a black hat, black scarf, black gown, and black pants. If you have contact with this SAFE Alert, please call 911. Monitor TV and Radio for updates.
